      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int id,
                   LocalDate rd,
                   LocalTime rt,
                   char sess,
                   String telNo,
                   String name,
                   int pax,
                   int t)
        Overriden constructor for Reservation
        Parameters:
        id - Reservation ID
        rd - Reservation Date
        rt - Reservation Time
        sess - Reservation Session
        telNo - Customer Telephone Number
        name - Customer Name
        pax - Number of pax for table
        t - Table number assigned

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(String[] csv)
            throws DateTimeParseException
        A method to read from a CSV string to convert to an object instance This needs to be overridden if you need to retrieve CSV data from file
        Parameters:
        csv - A string array of the CSV file
        Throws:
        DateTimeParseException - When the date time provided from the CSV file has an invalid format, which is unlikely to happen unless CSV file was modified outside of program.

      • hasReservation

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable Table hasReservation(String telNo)
        A method to return a Table object based on the telephone number. Checks through the list of reservations. Invokes method from Table class to return Table object
        Parameters:
        telNo - Telephone number in String
        Returns:
        Table object. Null if tableNum is eventually -1

      • getTablesBookedOnDateBySession

        public static ArrayList<Table> getTablesBookedOnDateBySession(LocalDate resvDate,
                                                              char resvSession)
        This following for-loop does the following functions Retrieves the table numbers that have been booked on the date the user specified and stores into a local instanced ArrayList. This ArrayList will be used for the upcoming for-loops
        Parameters:
        resvDate - Date of reservation input by user
        resvSession - Restaurant morning (A) or evening (P) session
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Tables booked on that date according to the session A or P
